trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of user-interface related <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> relacionados à interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can be enabled and disabled.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> pode ser ativado e desativado.

trans-unit.source: Only enabled <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objects will receive hit test and paint messages from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Habilitado somente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objetos receberá mensagens de teste e paint ocorrências da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can be viewed as a proxy between user-interface related elements, which consist of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> podem ser exibidos como um proxy entre a interface do usuário elementos relacionados, que consistem em todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objetos e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [visão geral do serviço de comportamento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> class interacts with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classes.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> classe interage com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classes.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.%23ctor%2A> constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> and is enabled, by default.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.%23ctor%2A> construtor cria um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> e é habilitado por padrão.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> classe.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, the collection sets this property so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can call back to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> é adicionado ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, a coleção define essa propriedade para que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> pode chamar de volta para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" /> estiver habilitada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Enabled%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class will send `HitTest` and `Paint` messages to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Enabled%2A> é de propriedade `true`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe enviará `HitTest` e `Paint` mensagens para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to enable and disable an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como habilitar e desabilitar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma listagem de código completo, consulte [como: estender a aparência e comportamento de controles no modo de Design](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> .

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> collection.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> coleção.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> to refresh its adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Força o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> a atualizar sua janela de adorno.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to force an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> window to repaint.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como forçar uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> janela seja redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma listagem de código completo, consulte [como: estender a aparência e comportamento de controles no modo de Design](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> to refresh its adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Força o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> a atualizar sua janela de adorno.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to force an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> window to repaint.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como forçar uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> janela seja redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma listagem de código completo, consulte [como: estender a aparência e comportamento de controles no modo de Design](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).

trans-unit.source: The area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: A área a ser invalidada.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> to refresh its adorner window within the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: Força o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> a atualizar sua janela de adorno dentro do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> determinado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> a ser invalidado.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> to refresh its adorner window within the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: Força o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> a atualizar sua janela de adorno dentro do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> determinado.
